availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Adam Leight Monroe. Physician and Surgeon, Dean and Professor of Material, Medicine, and Clinical Gynecology and Surgery, Southwestern Homeopathic College. Lousiville Ky. Died in Louisville in 1889.

bibl.p: "Kentucky Deaths and Burials, 1843-1970," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:FW5G-J5M), A. Leight Monroe; citing reference PG 199, 7952; FHL microfilm 2,022,161; La Bree, Benjamin Notable Men of Kentucky at the Beginning of the 20th Century (Lousiville: G.G. Fetter Print Co., 1902).
